mean_en: relating to or based on work done with real patients; of or relating to the medical treatment that is given to patients in hospitals, clinics, etc.
word_etyma: clinic诊所 + al形容词后缀 → clinical 诊所的
sentence: The clinical staff at the hospital told me that my health was excellent.
sentence_trans: 医院的临床医生告诉我我的健康状况非常好
